bibl.title: On the Rhetorical Significance of P. Hamb. 131.
bibl.note: The structure, content, and date of P. Hamb. II, 131 (= Pack2 2302) all make very unlikely the prospect that the papyrus is anything other than a fragment from a quantitative rhetoric.
bibl.seg: GAINES Robert N., On the Rhetorical Significance of P. Hamb. 131.
The structure, content, and date of P. Hamb. II, 131 (= Pack2 2302) all make very unlikely the prospect that the papyrus is anything other than a fragment from a quantitative rhetoric.
